title: Flying with the Fahans
description:
Joe and Margrit Fahan are a married couple who work together in a very cool office with an incredible view. Now boarding! 

Links: Follow the Flying Fahans on Instagram

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes
